page.title: 16North Bransholme.
page.content:
When I first moved onto North Bransholme I thought that it would be a bit boring. Now that I have got used to it it is quite good.
When I am bored I can get on my bike and ride around the estate or go into Wawne. Sometimes I go for walks in the countryside.
There aren't many shopping facilities around here but they reckon that some will be built on the waste ground by next year. Surveyors were working there measuring up the land last month.
I live near some woods, but they are going to put private houses there, they have already started chopping down the trees.
